title: Kriegspiel: the War-Game. [A novel.]
author: Groome, Francis Hindes
snippet: " But he's his brother-in-law. Why, you should havecut off straight from St. Andrews Square to PalmerstonPlace (that's where he hves), and told him you'd beensent by Mr. Gilmerton : ten to one you'd have baggedhim too. And once you'd booked his name, you couldhave got every writer and advocate and S.S.C. in Edinburgh down to the smallest law-agent.
